definition: it is reasonable to say that...
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: It would make sense that the richer that people became, the less they would save.
sentences.chinese: 按理說，人們越富裕，儲蓄率越低纔對。

sentences.english: It must have haunted him until his dying day.
sentences.chinese: 按理說，他應該感到內疚，直到他死去的那一天。

sentences.english: Therefore, anyone can locally host a web site.
sentences.chinese: 按理說，任何人都能本地發佈站點。

sentences.english: Sundays are supposed to be a day of rest and quiet reflection.
sentences.chinese: 週日按理說是休息和自我反思的好時節。

sentences.english: By rights, some tropical fish reproduce by laying eggs.
sentences.chinese: 按理說，有些熱帶魚靠產卵繁殖。

sentences.english: The twin-engine plane is supposed to be able to fly on one engine.
sentences.chinese: 這架雙引擎飛機按理說靠一個引擎也能飛。

sentences.english: Arguably, all he has left is the bully pulpit.
sentences.chinese: 按理說，留給他的只有這座天字一號的講壇。
